summary: FOR MONTHS, THE SERVICE LIGHT COMES ON IN THE CAR.  I HAVE TAKEN THE CAR IN FOR REPAIR 6 TIMES.  EACH TIME, THE LIGHT COMES BACK ON. VOLVO ENGINEER CAME IN FRIDAY TO SUPERVISE THE REPAIR OF CAR.  SATURDAY EVENING THE LIGHT WENT ON.    TWO WEEKS AGO, DEALER LOANED ME A 2003 V40 FOR SEVERAL DAYS WHILE THEY WORKED ON CAR.  SURPRISE!  SERVICE ENGINE LIGHT WENT ON IN LOANER CAR.  DURING LAST VISIT TO DEALER, TWO PEOPLE IN FRONT OF ME WERE COMING IN FOR SERVICE ENGINE LIGHT!    THERE IS A PROBLEM WITH THESE CARS.  I AM ON A LEASE, AND ASKING FACTORY TO TERMINATE LEASE.
